title: Do You Know That I Love You?
description: The lead singer of the most popular boy band in the world has a secret. A tabloid willing to tell all turns his world upside down. Mark Roeder is quickly establishing himself as the writer for gay and questioning teens. In Do You Know That I Love You, Ralph, a young gay teen living on a farm in Indiana, has an aching crush on a rock star and wants nothing more than to see his idol in concert. Meanwhile, Jordan, the rock star, is lonely and sometimes confused with his success, because all he wants is someone to love him and feels he will never find the love he craves.
author: Mark A. Roeder
